title: Constantly "Attempting to Reconnect"
body: My frames are usually around 80 and ping around 40-60 and yes i do get spike every now and again that hit 200-300 but even when my ping is as low as 40 im still getting "Attempting to Reconnect" at least every couple minutes and its even worse when i actually try fight or do something! Is anyone else getting this? is there a solution?

replies.body: Yeah I'm getting this too it's really annoying, rito halp pls

Low ping and "Attempting to Reconnect..."? That doesn't sound quite right.

What OS are you on, who's your ISP and how exactly are you connected to the net?
